mapper.insert: insert into TB_CRM_CONTACTS (ID, CREATOR_USER_ID, NAME, POST, DEPARTMENT, SEX, SALTNAME, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, QQ_NO, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, DESCRIPTION, CUSTOMER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_STATUS, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saltname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update TB_CRM_CONTACTS set CREATOR_USER_ID = #{creatorUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALTNAME = #{saltname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ_NO = #{qqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_STATUS = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_USER_ID = #{deleteUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, CREATOR_USER_ID, NAME, POST, DEPARTMENT, SEX, SALTNAME, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, QQ_NO, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, DESCRIPTION, CUSTOMER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_STATUS, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_TIME from TB_CRM_CONTACTS where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select ID, CREATOR_USER_ID, NAME, POST, DEPARTMENT, SEX, SALTNAME, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, QQ_NO, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, DESCRIPTION, CUSTOMER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETE_STATUS, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_TIME from TB_CRM_CONTACTS
